question:
Khwaja Muinuddin Chishti travelled to which of the following places?
1) Bukhara
2) Samarqand
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: According to Siyar-al-Arijin, Khwaja Muinuddin Chishti was a native of Sijistan in Central Asia who after selling his ancestral property travelled to Bukhara and Samarqand in the pursuit of knowledge.
